doc.previous: But the Schr dinger picture shown above is equivalent to the Heisenberg picture which enjoys a similarity to the Poisson brackets of classical mechanics The Poisson brackets are superseded by a nonzero commutator say H A for observable A and Hamiltonian H
doc.after: This equation denotes an uncertainty relation in quantum physics For example with time the observable A the energy E from the Hamiltonian H gives
